Game: Disney's Aladdin 1994-12-31T00:00:00-08:00 As Aladdin, baffle the guards in the streets of Agrabah. Elude the tempting traps in the Cave of Wonders, and the dangers of the Sultan's Palace. Ride the magic carpet through breathtaking skies.
